pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Tuesday, July 12, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Eastern Townships, Quebec

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit a heavy-duty electric vehicle production facility and meet with workers to highlight the government’s support for clean air, good jobs, and expanding electric vehicle manufacturing in Canada.

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage

1:10 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with local youth.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

National Capital Region, Canada

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will sign the book of condolences for the former Prime Minister of Japan, Shinzo Abe.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

The Prime Minister will speak with the Prime Minister of Japan, Kishida Fumio.
